primary.$description: Use for primary text, such as sentence case headings, field labels and buttons.

primary-inverted.$description: Use for primary text, such as sentence case headings, field labels and buttons on inverted surfaces.

disabled-on-surface.$description: Use for text in a disabled state but on color surfaces.

secondary.$description: Used for secondary text such as body paragraphs.

tertiary.$description: Use for less important texts such as meta-data, breadcrumbs, input field placeholder and helper text.

disabled.$description: Use for text in a disabled state.

default.$description: Used for highlight titles or words on a text block.

on-surface.$description: Use it when the accent text is over a teal-tinted surface (e.g. the label on a Secondary or Tertiary Button on hover state).

high-contrast.$description: Use it when the accent text needs a higher-contrast against a surface (e.g. the label on a Secondary or Tertiary Button on pressed state).

default.$description: Use for critical text, such as input field error messaging.

high-contrast.$description: Use for critical text on lighter red surfaces.

high-contrast-inverted.$description: Use for critical text on inverted surfaces.

default.$description: Use for informational text on inline content.

high-contrast.$description: Use for informational text on lighter blue surfaces.

high-contrast-inverted.$description: Use for informational text on inverted surfaces.

default.$description: Used for success text on inline content.

high-contrast.$description: Use for success text on lighter surfaces.

high-contrast-inverted.$description: Use for success text on inverted surfaces.

default.$description: Use for warning text on inline content.

high-contrast.$description: Use for warning text on lighter orange surfaces.

high-contrast-inverted.$description: Use for warning text on inverted surfaces.

default.$description: Used for emphasis text on inline content.

high-contrast.$description: Use for emphasis text on lighter purple surfaces.

high-contrast-inverted.$description: Use for emphasis text on inverted surfaces.

default.$description: Used for the fill for Primary Buttons on Default state.

pressed.$description: Used for the fill for Primary Buttons on Pressed state.

disabled.$description: Used for the fill for Primary Buttons on Disabled state.

default.$description: Used for the fill for Secondary Buttons on Default state.

pressed.$description: Used for the fill for Secondary Buttons on Pressed state.

disabled.$description: Used for the fill for Secondary Buttons on Disabled state.

default.$description: Used for the fill for Destructive Buttons on Default state.

hovered.$description: Used for the fill for Destructive Buttons on Hover state.

pressed.$description: Used for the fill for Destructive Buttons on Pressed state.

default.$description: Used for the border of a Secondary Button on Default state.

hovered.$description: Used for the border of a Secondary Button on Hover state.

pressed.$description: Used for the border of a Secondary Button on Pressed state.

disabled.$description: Used for the border of a Secondary Button on Disabled state.

default.$description: Use for default focus ring.

accent.$description: Use for the focus ring of highlighted components.

accent-inverted.$description: Use for the focus ring of highlighted components on inverted surface.

error.$description: Use for the focus ring of error state components.

error-inverted.$description: Use for the focus ring of error state components on inverted surfaces.

active.$description: Used for on the Active handle of a Scrollbar component.

inactive.$description: Used for on the Inactive handle of a Scrollbar component.

default.$description: "Used for the border of an Input

active.$description: "Used for the border of an Input

disabled.$description: "Used for the border of an Input

error.$description: "Used for the border of an Input

strong.$description: "Used for dividers with higher emphasis (e.g. dividers over tinted backgrounds

inverted.$description: Used for inverted dividers on solid backgrounds.

default.$description: Used for accented icons or containers with stroke.

strong.$description: Used for accented icons or containers with stroke that requires higher contrast.

solid.$description: Color border for solid info elements (banners, containers).

subtle.$description: Color border for subtle info elements (banners, containers).

solid.$description: Color border for solid success elements (banners, containers).

subtle.$description: Color border for subtle success elements (banners, containers).

solid.$description: Color border for solid warning elements (banners, containers).

subtle.$description: Color border for subtle warning elements (banners, containers).

solid.$description: Color border for solid error elements (tags, containers).

subtle.$description: Color border for subtle error elements (banners, containers).

default.$description: Used for links on default state.

pressed.$description: Used for links on pressed state.

disabled.$description: Used for links on a disabled state.

primary.$description: "Used for the fill color for elevated elements (menus

secondary.$description: Used for the fill color for elevated elements that needs a subtle contrast against the background

default.$description: "Used for the fill color for default interactive items (e.g. Menu items

hovered.$description: Used for the fill color for interactive items on Hover state.

selected.$description: Used for the fill color for interactive items on Selected state.

disabled.$description: Used for the fill color for disabled interactive elements (e.g. a disabled option on a menu).

strong.$description: Used for the background fill for sections that require a solid darker teal background.

solid.$description: Use it as the background fill for components or sections that require the brand teal color.

subtle.$description: Use it as an alternative background fill for sections that require a subtle teal background (e.g full-width promo banners, hero sections, etc).

solid.$description: Used for the main background fill for pages and sections.

subtle.$description: Use it as an alternative background to create contrast with other cards or sections (e.g a Dashboard).

solid.$description: Use it as an alternative background fill for sections that require a solid warm background (e.g full-width promo banners, hero sections, etc).

subtle.$description: Use it as an alternative background fill for sections that require a subtle warm background (e.g full-width promo banners, hero sections, etc).

solid.$description: Color background for solid success elements (tags, containers).

subtle.$description: Color background for subtle success elements (tags, containers).

solid.$description: Color background for solid info elements (tags, containers).

subtle.$description: Color background for subtle info elements (tags, containers).

solid.$description: Color background for solid warning elements (tags, containers).

subtle.$description: Color background for subtle warning elements (tags, containers).

solid.$description: Color background for solid error elements (tags, containers).

subtle.$description: Color background for subtle error elements (tags, containers).

primary.$description: Used for isolated icons with higher hierarchy

secondary.$description: Used for icon buttons on default state.

disabled.$description: Used for icons on a disabled state.

default.$description: Used for highlight icons and icon buttons on hover state.
Used for accompany helper texts in a component's error messages.

high-contrast.$description: Use it to accompany helper texts in a component's error messages that require higher contrast (e.g. a tinted red surface).

high-contrast-inverted.$description: Use it to accompany helper texts in a component's error messages on inverted surface.

default.$description: Used for informational icons.

high-contrast.$description: Use for informational icons on lighter blue surfaces.

high-contrast-inverted.$description: Use for informational icons on inverted surfaces.

default.$description: Used for warning icons.

high-contrast.$description: Use for warning icons on lighter orange surfaces.

high-contrast-inverted.$description: Use for warning icons on lighter orange surfaces.

default.$description: Used for success icons.

high-contrast.$description: Use for success icons on lighter green surfaces.

default.$description: Used for emphasis icons.

high-contrast.$description: Use for emphasis icons on lighter purple surfaces.

secondary.$description: Used for subtle icons on hover states.

disabled.$description: Used for subtle icons when disabled.

dark.$description: This is used for the dim fill overlay on modals and other panels that require the user's full attention.

light.$description: Use for the background blur effect.

graphic.$description: Color fill of graphic elements on selected theme (Illustration).
Color fill of graphic elements on selected theme (Illustration).
Color fill of graphic elements on selected theme (Illustration).
Color fill of graphic elements on selected theme (Illustration).

primary-background.$description: Color fill of graphic elements on selected theme (Illustration).

none.$description: (0px). Use when elements should have no gap or padding between them (e.g both consecutive sections have white bg, so the next section will have a 0px top padding to avoid an excessive spacing).

2xs.$description: (4px). Use for very tight spacing like icon-to-text gaps or subtle padding.

xs.$description: (8px). Use for compact component internal spacing or small gaps between related elements.

sm.$description: (12px). Use for moderate padding within components or gaps between closely related items.

md.$description: (16px). Default spacing for most component padding and gaps. Our baseline spacing unit.

lg.$description: (24px). Use for generous component padding or gaps between distinct sections.

xl.$description: (32px). Use for significant separation between components or section padding.

2xl.$description: (40px). Use for separation between content blocks within a section.

3xl.$description: (48px). Use for vertical separation between sections.

4xl.$description: (64px). Use for maximum spacing between distinct page areas or special layout needs.

square.$description: Sharp corners with no rounding (0px). Use for rectangular elements requiring hard edges.

sm.$description: Small corner radius (6px). Use for subtle rounding on cards and other UI elements.

md.$description: Medium corner radius (8px). Standard rounding for most components like inputs

xl.$description: Use it only for Search Typeahead menus and pill shaped items (e.g Quantity Stepper).

2xl.$description: Use it for pill-shaped elements like buttons and chips.

full.$description: Fully rounded borders (pill-shaped buttons). Equals 1000px radius on Figma.

xs.$description: (24px). Use as the base icon height and smaller elements.

sm.$description: (32px). Use it as the fixed height for Small Buttons and sm variants.

md.$description: (40px). Fixed height for default Chips (md)..

lg.$description: (48px). Fixed height for Large Buttons and other large component variants (lg).

xl.$description: (72px). Height for xl icon buttons and chips.

xs.$description: (16px). Height for the smallest icon size (Small Button)

sm.$description: (20px). Height for the icon in a Large Button.

md.$description: (24px). Default size for most standalone icons and instances in icon buttons.

lg.$description: (32px). Default size for most standalone icons and instances in icon buttons.

2xl.$description: (64px). Default size for most standalone icons and instances in icon buttons.

4xl.$description: (80px). Max height of a highlighted icon (e.g. a more detailed icon of a feature of benefit on a landing page).

button-mw-lg.$description: (128px). Ensures large buttons have substantial clickable area and prominent visual hierarchy.

button-mw-sm.$description: (96px). Ensures small buttons have adequate clickable area and visual presence.

bottom-fixed.$description: $elevation-component-bottom-fixed  Bottom sheets, fixed elements to the bottom.

sm.$description: $elevation-sm  Subtle elevation, tooltips, cards.

md.$description: $elevation-md  Dropdown menus.

primary.$description: Use it for the primary typography styles (Displays, headings).

secondary.$description: Use it for the secondary typography styles (labels, body copy, captions, etc).

uppercase.$description: Use it only for the Eyebrow typography style.

line-through.$description: Use it for the discounted price (text-strikethrough styles).

xl.$description: $desktop-typography-display-xl  Use for the largest display text in hero sections and major headings.

lg.$description: $desktop-typography-display-lg  Use for large display text in prominent hero sections.

md.$description: $desktop-typography-display-md  Use for medium display text in featured sections and banners.

sm.$description: $desktop-typography-display-sm  Use for smaller display text in secondary hero sections.

xs.$description: $desktop-typography-display-xs  Use for the smallest display text in tertiary featured content.

xl.$description: $desktop-typography-headline-xl  Use for extra large section headlines and page titles.

lg.$description: $desktop-typography-headline-lg  Use for large section headlines and major content groupings.

md.$description: $desktop-typography-headline-md  Use for medium section headlines and subsection titles.

sm.$description: $desktop-typography-headline-sm  Use for small section headlines and card titles.

lg.$description: $desktop-typography-price-lg  Use to display current products PDP.

lg-strikethrough.$description: $desktop-typography-price-lg-strikethrough  Use for display previous products price on PDP.

md.$description: $desktop-typography-price-md  Use to display current products price on standard product cards.

md-strikethrough.$description: $desktop-typography-price-md-strikethrough  Use to display previous products price on standard product cards.

sm.$description: $desktop-typography-price-sm  Use for small pricing display in compact layouts.

sm-strikethrough.$description: $desktop-typography-price-sm-strikethrough  Use for small crossed-out original prices in compact views.

regular.$description: $desktop-typography-text-xl-regular   Use for extra large body text in introductory paragraphs.

bold.$description: $desktop-typography-text-xl-bold  Use for emphasized extra large body text.

underline.$description: $desktop-typography-text-xl-underline  Use for underlined extra large text links.

regular.$description: $desktop-typography-text-lg-regular  Use for large body text in feature descriptions.

bold.$description: $desktop-typography-text-lg-bold  Use for emphasized large body text and subheadings.

underline.$description: $desktop-typography-text-lg-underline  Use for underlined large text links.

regular.$description: $desktop-typography-text-md-regular  Use for standard body text and paragraph content.

bold.$description: $desktop-typography-text-md-bold  Use for emphasized medium body text and inline headings.

underline.$description: $desktop-typography-text-md-underline  Use for underlined medium text links.

regular.$description: $desktop-typography-text-sm-regular  Use for small body text captions and secondary information.

bold.$description: $desktop-typography-text-sm-bold  Use for emphasized small text and labels.

underline.$description: $desktop-typography-text-sm-underline  Use for underlined small text links and footnotes.

md.$description: $desktop-typography-utility-cta-md  Use for for lg buttons.

sm.$description: $desktop-typography-utility-cta-sm  Use for sm buttons.

eyebrow.$description: $desktop-typography-utility-eyebrow  Use for small uppercase labels above headlines and sections.

xl.$description: Use for extra large vertical spacing in hero and feature sections.

lg.$description: Use for default vertical spacing (top and bottom padding) in major sections.

md.$description: Use for medium vertical spacing in standard sections.

sm.$description: Use for small vertical spacing in compact sections.

xs.$description: Use for extra small vertical spacing in tight layouts. Apply to top/bottom padding for adjacent sections with white bg.

lg.$description: Default horizontal padding for main content areas.

md.$description: Use for medium horizontal padding in standard containers.

sm.$description: Use for small horizontal padding in narrow containers.

xs.$description: Use for extra small horizontal padding in compact layouts.

sm.$description: Text sm.

md.$description: Text md.

xl.$description: $mobile-typography-display-xl  Use for the largest display text in hero sections and major headings.

lg.$description: $mobile-typography-display-lg  Use for large display text in prominent hero sections.

md.$description: $mobile-typography-display-md  Use for medium display text in featured sections and banners.

sm.$description: $mobile-typography-display-sm  Use for smaller display text in secondary hero sections.

xs.$description: $mobile-typography-display-xs  Use for the smallest display text in tertiary featured content.

xl.$description: $mobile-typography-headline-xl  Use for extra large section headlines and page titles.

lg.$description: $mobile-typography-headline-lg  Use for large section headlines and major content groupings.

md.$description: $mobile-typography-headline-md  Use for medium section headlines and subsection titles.

sm.$description: $mobile-typography-headline-sm  Use for small section headlines and card titles.

lg.$description: $mobile-typography-price-lg  Use to display current product's PDP.

lg-strikethrough.$description: $mobile-typography-price-lg-strikethrough  Use for display previous product's price on PDP.

md.$description: $mobile-typography-price-md  Use to display current product's price on standard product cards.

md-strikethrough.$description: $mobile-typography-price-md-strikethrough  Use to display previous product's price on standard product cards.

sm.$description: $mobile-typography-price-sm  Use for small pricing display in compact layouts.

sm-strikethrough.$description: $mobile-typography-price-sm-strikethrough  Use for small crossed-out original prices in compact views.

regular.$description: $mobile-typography-text-xl-regular   Use for extra large body text in introductory paragraphs.

bold.$description: $mobile-typography-text-xl-bold  Use for emphasized extra large body text.

underline.$description: $mobile-typography-text-xl-underline  Use for underlined extra large text links.

regular.$description: $mobile-typography-text-lg-regular  Use for large body text in feature descriptions.

bold.$description: $mobile-typography-text-lg-bold  Use for emphasized large body text and subheadings.

underline.$description: $mobile-typography-text-lg-underline  Use for underlined large text links.

regular.$description: $mobile-typography-text-md-regular  Use for standard body text and paragraph content.

bold.$description: $mobile-typography-text-md-bold  Use for emphasized medium body text and inline headings.

underline.$description: $mobile-typography-text-md-underline  Use for underlined medium text links.

regular.$description: $mobile-typography-text-sm-regular  Use for small body text captions and secondary information.

bold.$description: $mobile-typography-text-sm-bold  Use for emphasized small text and labels.

underline.$description: $mobile-typography-text-sm-underline  Use for underlined small text links and footnotes.

md.$description: $mobile-typography-utility-cta-md  Use for for lg buttons.

sm.$description: $mobile-typography-utility-cta-sm  Use for sm buttons.

eyebrow.$description: $mobile-typography-utility-eyebrow  Use for small uppercase labels above headlines and sections.

xl.$description: Use for extra large vertical spacing in hero and feature sections.

lg.$description: Use for default vertical spacing (top and bottom padding) in major sections.

md.$description: Use for medium vertical spacing in standard sections.

sm.$description: Use for small vertical spacing in compact sections.

xs.$description: Use for extra small vertical spacing in tight layouts. Apply to top/bottom padding for adjacent sections with white bg.

lg.$description: Default horizontal padding for main content areas.

md.$description: Use for medium horizontal padding in standard containers.

sm.$description: Use for small horizontal padding in narrow containers.

xs.$description: Use for extra small horizontal padding in compact layouts.

sm.$description: Text sm.

md.$description: Text md.

sm.$description: 576-767px - Phablets and small tablets

md.$description: 768-991px - Tablets, windowed display

xl.$description: 1200-1727px - Computers, laptops, premium tablets, folding phones (HD/FHD)

1:1.$description: Square aspect ratio. Default illustrations, product or recipe thumbnail, also used for avatar pictures.

3:2.$description: Horizontal 3:2 aspect ratio. Use it for illustrations or images on mobile, it's not restricted for desktop either.

16:9.$description: Horizontal 16:9 aspect ratio. Use it for featured images or product shots (mostly sets) where the cropping area affects visibility of the entire image.

4:3.$description: Horizontal 4:3. Default use for single images on Hero sections.

1:1.$description: Square aspect ratio. Default illustrations, product or recipe thumbnail, also used for avatar pictures.

default.$description: Use for default focus ring.

default-inverted.$description: Use for default focus ring on inverted surfaces.

accent.$description: Use for the focus ring of highlighted components.

error.$description: Use for the focus ring of error state components.

error-inverted.$description: Use for the focus ring of error state components on inverted surfaces.
